title: R. Carlos Nakai/Peter Kater - Natives
description: This download contains SPIRIT torrent file for more PK so just click it to start downloading some more piano instrumental. - Big Papi [quote="By michael prather"]I once had a cassette of this and it was accidently taped over and my heart was broken. I had searched all over and found the cd and since, have held it close to my heart. Regaurdless of what opinions of what Carlos's music is supposed to be like, or what traditional Native American music is supposed to be like, I find that this cd is a wonderful mix of music to create such a peaceful and moving atmosphere. It brings tears to my eyes, makes me think of wonderful, and peaceful places. If you have an open mind for music and are willing to accept that a Native style flute and a contemporary style piano can play together, without getting uptight about it, then you will find this to be one of Carlos and Peter's best works together.[/quote] [img]http://extraimago.com/images/2015/08/27/Folder.md.jpg[/img] --------------------------------------------------------------------- R.
